title: Book a Standard Hotel Room
description: A customer wants to book a standard king room for two nights.

tasks.description: Check availability for a standard king room for the requested dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that a standard king room is available.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with the total price, including taxes and fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates and communicates the total cost.

tasks.description: Create a new reservation with the customer's details and collect payment information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new booking and obtains a confirmation number.
